channel.title: Ollama on PolloChang 工作筆記
channel.description: Recent content in Ollama on PolloChang 工作筆記

item.title: Ollama Install in Debain12
item.description: 安裝環境 OS: Debian 12 RAM: 64G CPU: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1145G7 @ 2.60GHz https://man.twcc.ai/@preview-twccdocs/BkMbEvScj 安裝方法 MacOS Download Ollama Debian 12 sudo apt install -y build-essential libssl-dev libffi-dev python3-dev curl -fsSL https://ollama.com/install.sh | sh ❯ curl -fsSL https://ollama.com/install.sh | sh >>> Downloading ollama... ######################################################################## 100.0%##O=# # >>> Installing ollama to /usr/local/bin... >>> Creating ollama user... >>> Adding ollama user to render group... >>> Adding ollama user to video group... >>> Adding current user to ollama group.
